name: Breaking Friendships
description:
Help time-traveling residents power their apartments

  • You will finish a sentence about your friend.
  • Your friend will confirm how true it is for themselves.

    The strength of your friendship will generate electricity.

    Replayability

    There are 660+ fun, light-hearted questions hand-crafted to create the best experience for you. They aim to be replayable and to give you a plethora of enjoyable topics to talk about.

    Endings

    There are nine endings - each flavored with a Time Travelling reward. You may need a lot of practice and knowledge about your friend to earn the highest one. You will be rewarded with our only Steam achievement by doing so. Don't give up!

    Disclaimer

    "Breaking Friendships" could alter friendships. We take full credit for all the friendships strengthened by it and none of the responsibilities for all the ones that might fail. Proceed with caution.


    Please watch the Introduction video (above) for full information on how to play, bonuses, and progression.
